Usage#

Installation#

To use SpExod, first install it using pip:

(.venv) $ pip install spexod

Or try one of the other installation methods.

(.venv) $ conda install -c conda-forge spexod

Or

git clone https://github.com/spexod/spexod cd spexod pip install .

Retrieving Data#

Note

It may be helpful to view the DataFlow source page as you follow along with the documentation.

To retrieve a list of random ingredients, you can use the API.get_available_isotopologues() function:

API.get_available_isotopologues() → dict#

Returns a dictionary of available isotopologues and their properties

The kind parameter should be either "meat", "fish", or "veggies". Otherwise, lumache.get_random_ingredients() will raise an exception.

exception lumache.InvalidKindError#

Raised if the kind is invalid.

>>> import lumache
>>> lumache.get_random_ingredients()
['shells', 'gorgonzola', 'parsley']
